scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm install   --prefix  angular-app" "npm install   --prefix app-shell" "npm install   --prefix react-app" "npm install  --prefix  vue-app"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm start   --prefix angular-app" "npm start  --prefix app-shell" "npm run dev  --prefix react-app" "npm run build  --prefix vue-app" "npm run preview  --prefix vue-app"
